positive.review: Great game not sure why got so many negative reviews the only thing that bad about this game is 3D characters model during dueling and debating that use the same models.
The more I play this game, the more I want to play Romance of the Three Kingdoms X. When is that going to get a remake?

This review is posted during 40% sales:

So. finally I have gotten the game at a more reasonable price. Still, I don't think it is worth that much. These day, even at this sales price tag. I can easily get way better game, made with more effort and passion, better graphics better game mechanics and all that Jazz. 

This game isn't bad, probably buggy at release but it is definitely better than RTK 14. While I never tried RTK 8, it reminded me a lot about RTK 13, which I like a lot. You can create your own entire family tree of original characters to play with. Interact like you would in RTK 13 but missing some features but had other different features that make it good. 

Battles are turn base and very much traditional. Field battle strategies are brilliant and devastating. Which is fun. What it lacks is the more in depth dynamics of grand strategy scheming you can pull off in RTK 13. In RTK 13, you can trick 2 factions to go to war with one another. You can also use friendship connections and start a civil war with most of the generals turning against your lord.

Yep, it has its ups, it has its down but over all. It is a decent game. The problem is...

KOEI gave it a ridiculous price tag at full price that it doesn't deserve. Even at 40% sales price tag. It still feels low effort.
In this day and age. A small team of developers would most likely make a game better than this one in all aspect at the same price they are offering even on sales.

What are we really paying for? Japanese branded Developers? Just because it is made in Japan? What a joke.

Why so many negative reviews, ROTK 8 is purely role playing, it's true the events need to be triggered by you, but that's the whole point of this game, you basically roam around as a free officer and set the story in motion based on your actions. If you like the role playing aspect, play this or ROTK13, if not try the other ROTK games
Great game not sure why got so many negative reviews the only thing that bad about this game is 3D characters model during dueling and debating that use the same models.
the game is ok, a bit repetitive and feels like doing chores after a few hours.
Excellent game, unless you have the average TINY attention span.  Those folks should stick to Minecraft.
The more I play this game, the more I want to play Romance of the Three Kingdoms X. When is that going to get a remake?
Easy to play, not that complicated.
good
Fun!~
working well.
